TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CommandEventHandler(object sender, CommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As CommandEventArgs)
public delegate void CommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, CommandEventArgs ^ e);
type CommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * CommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Command`当 单击、或控件时，将引发事件 。The `Command` event is raised when a , , or control is clicked. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为控件的事件指定和编写处理程序 。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event of a control. 此示例使用控件的属性以声明方式指定事件处理程序 。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到方法中的事件 `Page_Load` 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]
